column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A group Chinese nationals
column4: began fighting each other after drinking at 10:20 pm on May 28
column5: 2019. The violence flared up at a construction site in Boeung Kak area
column6: along ------R8------ road in Sras Chak commune
column7: Daun Penh district.------A local security guard who was staying there said that before the incident
column8: people working at the site got very drunk.  Arguments broke out and some men armed themselves with knives and others with batons
column9: causing a lot of injuries. Three people were sent to the hospital.------Police of Daun Penh district came to the scene to find out who had been involved and investigate the incident. ------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/56107
